summary: After an accident, a government Agent gains the ability of super-speed and goes after an old friend turned Nemesis.

Clyde|Scott Hanks|Kari Hawker-Diaz|Joyce Cohen|James Jamison|Charles Halford|Tim Whitaker|Sheldon Worthington|Brighton Leigh|K. Danor Gerald|Clayton Taylor|Tennay Evans|Alex Nibley|Ann Bosler|Socorro Herrera|Stephen Rippey|Nika Tufuga Valal|Rhett Panose|Brent Steffensen|John E. Moyer|John Corser|Jim Jepson|Richard King|Heidi Webster|Rhett Willman|Ben Wray
title: Lightspeed
